#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
   ll t,n,oa,ea,odd,even,o,e;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       cin>>n;
       if(n%2!=0)
       {
           o=n/2+1;
           e=n/2;
           oa=1;
           ea=2;
           odd=o*(2*oa+(o-1)*2)/2;
           even=e*(2*ea+(e-1)*2)/2;
           cout<<odd-even;
       }
       else
       {
           o=n/2;
           e=n/2;
           oa=1;
           ea=2;
           odd=o*(2*oa+(o-1)*2)/2;
           even=e*(2*ea+(e-1)*2)/2;
           cout<<odd-even;
       }
       cout<<'\n';
   }
   return 0;
}
